issue.title: [GLib] GArrowArray: concatenate is missing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11859](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11859). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
please add concat_arrays to Arrow::Array classes. This has been added separately to Python but would be good to have for all languages.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11859?focusedCommentId=17302034) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9697
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9697>
